Company Name: Allianz Saudi Fransi Cooperative Insurance Co (8040)
Description: Allianz Saudi Fransi Cooperative Insurance (known as: Allianz SF) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since July 2007. Allianz SF operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. It has companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Life and Health Insurance and Property and Casualty Insurance. Allianz SF is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in July 2007.

Shareholder Name: Hayfa Bint Mhnaa bin Abdulrahman Al Mhnaa
Bander Bin Abdullah Bin Abdul Aziz bin Abdul Rahman Al Saud
Badr Bin Abdullah Bin Abdul Aziz bin Abdul Rahman Al Saud
